title: Joe Biden To Pass Torch To Kamala Harris In Bittersweet Farewell Address
content: US President Joe Biden will give a bittersweet farewell address at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago on Monday, passing the torch to Kamala Harris as the party's nominee for November's election.
summary: US President Joe Biden will give a bittersweet farewell address at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago on Monday, passing the torch to Kamala Harris as the party's nominee for November's election.

title: Malala Yousafzai's Post On Taliban After Attending Taylor Swift Concert
content: Malala Yousafzai said she had a "magical" moment at Taylor Swift's concert and remembered the significance of the singer in her life.
summary: Malala Yousafzai said she had a "magical" moment at Taylor Swift's concert and remembered the significance of the singer in her life.

title: AI News Sites Mimicking Media Outlets To Spew Fake News About US Polls
content: Pro-Kremlin sites masquerading as US "news" outlets have dished out unfounded claims that Democrats plotted to assassinate Donald Trump, a prime example of how phoney AI-powered portals are spewing inflammatory falsehoods in an election year.
summary: Pro-Kremlin sites masquerading as US "news" outlets have dished out unfounded claims that Democrats plotted to assassinate Donald Trump, a prime example of how phoney AI-powered portals are spewing inflammatory falsehoods in an election year.

title: Kamala Harris Leads Trump In Poll As Democratic Convention Begins Tonight
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris holds a narrow lead over her Republican rival Donald Trump in the upcoming presidential election, according to a Washington Post-ABC News-Ipsos poll.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris holds a narrow lead over her Republican rival Donald Trump in the upcoming presidential election, according to a Washington Post-ABC News-Ipsos poll.

title: Philippine Vessel "Deliberately" Collided With Chinese Vessel: Beijing
content: China's Coast Guard said a Philippine vessel that had ignored its repeated warnings "deliberately collided" with a Chinese vessel in an "unprofessional and dangerous" manner in the disputed South China Sea, according to statements on Monday.
summary: China's Coast Guard said a Philippine vessel that had ignored its repeated warnings "deliberately collided" with a Chinese vessel in an "unprofessional and dangerous" manner in the disputed South China Sea, according to statements on Monday.

title: Kamala Harris Arrives In Chicago Ahead Of Democratic Convention
content: Kamala Harris arrived in Chicago on Sunday ahead of her star turn at the Democratic National Convention.
summary: Kamala Harris arrived in Chicago on Sunday ahead of her star turn at the Democratic National Convention.

title: Ukraine Says Struck 2nd Bridge In Russia's Kursk As Incursion Continues
content: Ukraine said Sunday it had struck a second key bridge in the Kursk region, seeking to disrupt Moscow's supply routes as Kyiv's unprecedented incursion on Russian soil stretched through its second week.
summary: Ukraine said Sunday it had struck a second key bridge in the Kursk region, seeking to disrupt Moscow's supply routes as Kyiv's unprecedented incursion on Russian soil stretched through its second week.

title: Probe Reveals Former Pak PM Imran Khan's Ties With Arrested Ex ISI Chief
content: New details have emerged in an ongoing probe into the relationship between Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) founder Imran Khan and former ISI Director-General Lieutenant General (retd) Faiz Hameed, as reported by The Express Tribune.
summary: New details have emerged in an ongoing probe into the relationship between Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) founder Imran Khan and former ISI Director-General Lieutenant General (retd) Faiz Hameed, as reported by The Express Tribune.

title: Hamas Again Accuses Israel's Netanyahu Of "Obstructing" Gaza Truce Deal
content: Hamas on Sunday again accused Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of "obstructing an agreement" for a truce and hostage exchange in Gaza.
summary: Hamas on Sunday again accused Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of "obstructing an agreement" for a truce and hostage exchange in Gaza.

title: Video: India Day Parade In New York Features Replica Of Ayodhya Ram Mandir
content: People in large numbers participated in the India Day Parade held in New York, US. A carnival float featuring Ram Mandir was also part of the parade.
summary: People in large numbers participated in the India Day Parade held in New York, US. A carnival float featuring Ram Mandir was also part of the parade.

title: Kamala Harris On Bus Tour Of Pennsylvania Ahead Of Democratic Convention
content: Kamala Harris embarked on a bus tour of the potentially election-deciding state of Pennsylvania on Sunday, as she keeps up the momentum before her star turn at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago.
summary: Kamala Harris embarked on a bus tour of the potentially election-deciding state of Pennsylvania on Sunday, as she keeps up the momentum before her star turn at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago.

title: French Film Legend Alain Delon Dies. He Was 88
content: French film legend Alain Delon, a divisive star known to some as a sex symbol and to others as an egotistical chauvinist, has died aged 88, his children announced Sunday.
summary: French film legend Alain Delon, a divisive star known to some as a sex symbol and to others as an egotistical chauvinist, has died aged 88, his children announced Sunday.

title: 5.1 Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Off Japan, Tremors Felt In Central Tokyo
content: An earthquake with a preliminary magnitude of 5.1 struck off the Japanese prefecture of Ibaraki, just northeast of Tokyo, the country's weather agency said.
summary: An earthquake with a preliminary magnitude of 5.1 struck off the Japanese prefecture of Ibaraki, just northeast of Tokyo, the country's weather agency said.

title: With Kamala Harris At Helm, Democrats Meet With New Hope, Some Old Worries
content: In the five weeks since U.S President Joe Biden abandoned his flailing reelection bid, the Democratic Party's fortunes have changed dramatically, and this week the change will be on full display.
summary: In the five weeks since U.S President Joe Biden abandoned his flailing reelection bid, the Democratic Party's fortunes have changed dramatically, and this week the change will be on full display.

title: Putin Arrives In Azerbaijan After 6 Years For 2-Day State Visit: Report
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin arrived in Azerbaijan's capital Baku on Sunday for a two-day state visit, Russian news agencies reported.

title: Blinken Arrives In Israel As Netanyahu Blames Hamas For No Gaza Truce Yet
content: Israel's under-pressure prime minister traded blame with Hamas on Sunday for delays in reaching a Gaza truce accord as top US diplomat Antony Blinken landed in Tel Aviv to push for a deal.

title: Amazon Rainforest Tribe's Secret To Healthy Life And Slow Ageing Revealed
content: The Tsimanes, consisting of 16,000 people, live a fully subsistence lifestyle, relying on hunting, foraging and farming to survive.
summary: The Tsimanes, consisting of 16,000 people, live a fully subsistence lifestyle, relying on hunting, foraging and farming to survive.
